meanings.definition: To give birth to or produce cubs.
meanings.sent1: The mama bear cubbed in the den.
meanings.sent2: The lioness cubbed in the tall grass.
meanings.sent3: The panda cubbed in the zoo, much to the delight of visitors.
meanings.sent4: The tree cubbed new branches, reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The fox cubbed under the moonlit sky, a magical sight.

meanings.definition: To confine or keep in a small space.
meanings.sent1: The cat cubbed in the cozy basket.
meanings.sent2: The bird cubbed in the cage.
meanings.sent3: The toy cubbed in the box, waiting to be played with.
meanings.sent4: The idea cubbed in his mind, eager to be shared.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel cubbed in the hollow tree, safe from the storm.

meanings.definition: To cut or shape with a chisel.
meanings.sent1: The sculptor cubbed the marble into a beautiful statue.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter cubbed the wood to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The artist cubbed intricate designs into the clay.
meanings.sent4: The ice sculptor cubbed the frozen block with precision.
meanings.sent5: The stonemason cubbed the rock into a work of art.
